nodes.text: The Ironwithe was a type of plant native to the planet Bogden. It was hard as durasteel, yet its shoots were the major part of a giant renda bear's diet. Every few decades, an event would be triggered where ironwithe plants would die planet-wide, even affecting ironwithe growth parsecs and planets away.
It was also a popular export to Coruscant and other Core Worlds for rooftop gardens.
